> #Generate normal distribution
> mean = 100
> sd = 10
> x = rnorm(100, mean, sd)
> x
  [1]  76.07745  89.71324  89.93909  94.51018  92.54046 102.47376  95.51380

> # Find numbers 2 sd away from mean
> x[abs(mean - x) > 2 * sd]
[1]  76.07745 120.67604  78.21424  70.80166
